Rulings.Tengu:
You can only activate this card during a turn in which a Level 8 or higher monster on your side of the field was sent to the GY. Special Summon 1 Berserk Dragon from your hand or Deck.
●The Level in A Deal with Dark Ruler is the original Level printed on the Monster Card.
●If your opponent's Level 8 or higher monster than you control is sent to the GY, you can activate A Deal with Dark Ruler.
●You cannot activate A Deal with Dark Ruler during the Damage Step.
●You can only Special Summon 1 monster with A Deal with Dark Ruler, but you can activate 2 copies of A Deal with Dark Ruler to Special Summon 1 Berserk Dragon for each, even if only 1 Level 8 or higher monster was sent to the GY.
●You can activate A Deal with Dark Ruler if your Level 8 or higher monster that is an Equip Spell Card is sent from your side of the field to the GY (such as Koitsu or Dark Necrofear destroyed by Heavy Storm).
Rulings.Goat:
●This is not an 'Archfiend' card. ●The Lv in A Deal with Dark Ruler is the original Lv printed on the Monster Card.
●If your opponent's Lv 8 or higher monster than you control is sent to the GY, you can activate A Deal with Dark Ruler.
●You cannot activate A Deal with Dark Ruler during the Damage Step.
●You can only Special Summon 1 monster with A Deal with Dark Ruler, but you can activate 2 copies of A Deal with Dark Ruler to Special Summon 1 Berserk Dragon for each, even if only 1 Lv 8 or higher monster was sent to the GY.
●You can activate A Deal with Dark Ruler if your Lv 8 or higher monster that is an Equip Spell Card is sent from your side of the field to the GY (such as Koitsu or Dark Necrofear destroyed by Heavy Storm).
●If the summon of a Lv 8 or higher monster is negated, “A Deal with Dark Ruler” may not be activated for that monster.

Rulings.Base:
1. The "Level" in "A Deal with Dark Ruler" is the original Level printed on the Monster Card.
2. If your opponent's Level 8 or higher monster than you control is sent to the GY, you can activate "A Deal with Dark Ruler".
3. You cannot activate "A Deal with Dark Ruler" during the Damage Step.
4. You can only Special Summon 1 monster with "A Deal with Dark Ruler", but you can activate 2 copies of "A Deal with Dark Ruler" to Special Summon 1 "Berserk Dragon" for each, even if only 1 Level 8 or higher monster was sent to the GY.
5. You can activate "A Deal with Dark Ruler" if your Level 8 or higher monster that is an Equip Spell Card is sent from your side of the field to the GY (such as "Koitsu" or "Dark Necrofear" destroyed by "Heavy Storm").
